hints.content: For $\dfrac13$ and $\dfrac26$ to be equivalent, they must be fractions of  the same size whole.
Which image shows $\dfrac13$ and $\dfrac26$ represented on the same size whole?

options.alt: Two rectangles, separated by an equal sign. The rectangles are the same size. The top rectangle is divided into 3 equal parts. 1 part is shaded. The bottom rectangle is divided into 6 equal parts. 2 parts are shaded. !

Two rectangles, separated by an equal sign. The rectangles are the same size. The top rectangle is divided into 3 equal parts. 1 part is shaded. The bottom rectangle is divided into 6 equal parts. 2 parts are shaded. !
